explains: v. 向……移动，被吸引到；（物理）受重力（或其他引力）作用而运动（或倾向于运动）

sentences.en: Many young people gravitate to the cities in search of work.
sentences.cn: 许多年轻人被吸引到城里找工作。

sentences.en: You naturally gravitate toward people with shared values.
sentences.cn: 你自然而然地被具有共同价值观的人吸引。

sentences.en: The elderly gravitate there, shuffling in cheerful pairs along Marine Parade or jogging in slow motion past the Sea Gull Café, intent on some distant goal.
sentences.cn: 被吸引到那里的老人们，或是成对欢愉地沿着马林百列缓步慢行，或是不紧不慢地经过海鸥咖啡店，要去往远处的某个地方。
